rule.edit: Tinye ma ọ bụ dezie ndenye iwu
rule.description: Ị nwere ike tinye ntọala a site na ịpị aka nri na ibe weebụ ọ bụla mgbe ị na-abanye na ibe weebụ, a ga-agbakwunye URL nke ibe weebụ na ndabara .

url.title: Ụdị URL, URL zuru ezu.
url.explain: Usoro a nwere ike dabara na URL zuru ezu.

glob.title: Usoro glob na-eji {{1}} ọba akwụkwọ biko hụ maka ojiji, ma ọ bụ ị nwere ike chọọ ojiji nke {{2}}.

example.a: {{1}, nke dabara na ibe YouTube na ibe ha niile.

regexp.title: Okwu oge niile, biko hụ Lee maka ojiji.

onlyForCurrentRule.title: Na-arụ ọrụ naanị maka iwu ugbu a:
onlyForCurrentRule.explain: Ọ bụrụ na enyocha ya, enwere ike iji ya naanị maka iwu ugbu a, ma ọ bụghị ya, enwere ike iji iwu ụwa niile.
